ValidationRule.description: Certain field is required when selecting a Payment Type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.Name = "Refund Request", ISPICKVAL(Payment_Type__c,"credit card") && or( ISBLANK(CC_Transaction_Date__c), ISBLANK(CC_Name_on_Card__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Credit card info are required for Credit Card Refund
